title: Cannot Recover Username?
body: So I have been trying to get into my account with my original email, so I went to recover username, typed in my email and clicked send. I didn't get a Riot email so I waited for about 10-15 minutes, checked again, nothing. I tried entering the email for the account I'm currently using and received the email immediately. I did not incorrectly enter my original email and am wondering if anyone can explain why I'm not getting the recovery email? I've tried to submit a ticket to Riot Games Support but I do not remember my account creation date.

replies.body: Your recovery email could be hitting your spam folders.  Otherwise, the account you're trying to recover could be tied to another email.  Our account recovery team can help verify and update info, just hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  We'll review your case and get back to you asap!
